sensorthings.components.locations package

Submodules

sensorthings.components.locations.engine module

class sensorthings.components.locations.engine.LocationBaseEngine

Bases: object

Abstract base class for handling Locations.

This class defines the required methods for managing locations. These methods must be implemented to allow the SensorThings API to interface with an underlying database.

abstract create_location(location)

Create a new location.

Parameters:

location (dict) – The location data to be created.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created location.

Return type:

str

abstract delete_location(location_id)

Delete a location.

Parameters:

location_id (str) – The ID of the location to delete.

Return type:

None

abstract get_locations(location_ids=None, thing_ids=None, historical_location_ids=None, pagination=None, ordering=None, filters=None, expanded=False)

Retrieve locations based on provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • location_ids (List[str], optional) – List of location IDs to filter the results.

  • thing_ids (List[str], optional) – List of thing IDs to filter the results.

  • historical_location_ids (List[str], optional) – List of historical location IDs to filter the results.

  • pagination (dict, optional) – Pagination information to limit the number of results.

  • ordering (dict, optional) – Ordering information to sort the results.

  • filters (dict, optional) – Additional filters to apply to the query.

  • expanded (bool, optional) – Whether to include expanded information in the results.

Return type:

(Dict[str, dict], int)

Returns:

  • Dict[str, dict] – A dictionary of locations, keyed by their IDs.

  • int – The total number of locations matching the query.

abstract update_location(location_id, location)

Update an existing location.

Parameters:

  • location_id (str) – The ID of the location to update.

  • location (dict) – The updated location data.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.components.locations.schemas module

class sensorthings.components.locations.schemas.Location(**data)

Bases: BaseComponent, LocationFields, LocationRelations

A schema representing a location.

This class combines the fields and relations of a location, and extends the BaseComponent class.

class sensorthings.components.locations.schemas.LocationRelations(**data)

Bases: Schema

A schema representing the relations of a location to other components.

things

The list of things associated with the location.

Type:

List[‘Thing’]

The list of historical locations associated with the location.

Type:

List[‘HistoricalLocation’]

historical_locations: List[HistoricalLocation]
